TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content: hmm. yeah just gonan get ride of the extendable part. it is hidious with otu the hydralics
Very nice pack. Don\'t know why, but KSP doesn\'t allow me to rename the ship files. Not a big deal, but still kinda bothering me.
huh? well open them in kerbal. then delete the file, change the name in game and resave. should take care of it for you.
K just gonna make it a pretty ring that looks liek one flipped 180 can hook into it

K finished the texture for this thing. I made it so that it onyl take sup half the UV area. this way modders cna add other parts to the model with out redoing the UVs.

Now to slap it onto the Durgun.

anyway back on track. i made a tri adapter for the original 1 meter engines (which where renamed to Kriffun Engines) I think I will altering the 1 meter kerlin engines a bit to make them seem like more than a scaled up version of kerlins. Also i will be rebalancing their power. currently they are merely twice as powerful as the 0.5 versions. however according to specs from Space X the Griffin engines will be more powerful than a mere twice their smaller counter parts. If I make it so Three can power the Failcan core to space with equal thrust they should make 900 thrust. and chug fuel. however I think i will up their power from their original 690 to like 750 and leave their fuel consumptions down. This should result in slower launch speed but more lifting capabilities.

When cost comes into play and needs balancing they will of course cost a good bit more than 9 kerlins.

Edit: first succsessful launch. It absolutly Crawls into space but the fuel savings get it there 'better' but defiantly less cool than the 9 variant.

OH GOD WHAT THE CHRIST THAT IS AMAZING
Those come with v0.4.

K finished the texture for this thing. I made it so that it onyl take sup half the UV area. this way modders cna add other parts to the model with out redoing the UVs.

Now to slap it onto the Durgun.

I want docking, NOW!

i have never seen anyone so excited about something that is just a 1 meter engine and an adapter plate but thanks

as for the docking It will be nice to have a part ready for it when it comes out.

i have never seen anyone so excited about something that is just a 1 meter engine and an adapter plate but thanks

as for the docking It will be nice to have a part ready for it when it comes out.

You have real modeling skill. Try another private spacecraft company.
lollike what? most space craft stuff is ugly to me.
Maybe the Proton (Standard UR-500 or 8K82K /M)?
oh gosh. that i what they got Mir up there with eh? weird. seems liek soemthing nova should do. it seems like it would work well because it all seems modular where as i like efficiency.
hmm. I thinkk i will change my shuttlw design. I love the x24a shape but itis very hard to model in a way that appeals to my tastes and it is quiteusless lolthink the x-33 will do.
after looking into it more yes i will be doing this. was always fascinated with this bugger as a kid anyway. shame they cancelled it.
I would be in love with you if you made a satellite for the Proton rocket too. Like a GLONASS satellite.
I dislike proton sorry lol.

anyway, -yawn- I extruded me out a hull. it has th beginnings of wings now too.

i love that it is just a big flying reusable gas tank lol.

anyway, -yawn- I extruded me out a hull. it has th beginnings of wings now too.

i love that it is just a big flying reusable gas tank lol.

You should call it the Kerbalstar (X-33 was going to be Venturestar.)

anyway, -yawn- I extruded me out a hull. it has th beginnings of wings now too.

i love that it is just a big flying reusable gas tank lol.

Looks interesting. Will it be one staged like the original X-33, or multiple staged like the shuttle?

as for staging the venture star was just going to be a big flying fuel tank that could glide back to earth and be reused So this will be about the same. In the en designers decided Cargo and stuff could puggy back on outside. so ithink i will do the same. We will see though.

But it will just bean orbital Vehicle. but i will probably make an adapter or something to strap a booster onto it fi you want to go to the mun.

I really love these models, but can\'t seem to attach the capsule engines without them blowing up whenever I activate the stage, and I can\'t find the .craft files people are talking about. Can someone point me in the right direction?

Thanks!
They\'re included with the download, if you have the parts you should also have the .craft files.

yeah in the .rar there is a parts folder and a ship folder. You sort of need the Durgun Craft. it is somewhat hard to assemble. It needs strut connectors placed in a special spot for some odd reason. otherwise it breaks.

Oh right, found it, thanks! The alphabetisation had put it in different place to the parts, and I didn\'t think to look there.

Awesome 8)
